alert.note: Alert for Livingston; Macomb; Oakland; St. Clair; Washtenaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Ice Storm Warning issued February 22 at 6:04PM EST until February 23 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...ICE STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Significant icing expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a quarter to half inch. * WHERE...St. Clair, Livingston, Oakland, Macomb and Washtenaw Counties. * WHEN...From noon today to 4 AM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Sleet and freezing rain, heavy at times, will continue into the evening with significant icing occuring before tapering off after midnight.
info.instruction: Travel is strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages.

area.areaDesc: Livingston; Macomb; Oakland; St. Clair; Washtenaw
